prod.desciption: Jordan Brand and Virgil Abloh teamed up once again to release the third silhouette in their collaborative history with the women's Jordan 4 Retro Off-White Sail (W), now available on StockX. After teasing the release of the Off-White 4 with samples in his MCA exhibit and presenting them in his Off-White FW2020 Women�s Show, Virgil Abloh finally delivered what might be the most anticipated release of 2020. The Air Jordan 4 Sail features full-grain leather uppers with hits of mesh and translucent materials on the toebox and heel of the shoe. From there, hits of light blue on the tongue�s Jumpman and the outsole�s Nike Swoosh provide contrast to the sail colored sneaker. These women's sneakers released in July of 2020 and retailed for $200 USD.
